recommendations: Krista Nilsen Bordner
Communication Consultant
March 30, 2009, Krista reported directly to Kurt

I had the opportunity to work with, and learn from, Kurt Wildermuth from 2003 to 2004, when he was a professor at Northern Arizona University. I received my introduction to the world of public relations and integrated marketing communications from Kurt. My coursework with Kurt has been a highlight of my PR career, and I have him to thank for my strong foundation. Even today, I can still turn to Kurt for PR and career advice, and he is always happy to help and offer guidance. Kurt Wildermuth is a wonderful, highly talented and knowledgeable PR and communications pro. Thanks Kurt!

Lynne Dewar
Fairway Independent Mortgage Corporation - Sr. Loan Officer
September 13, 2010, Kurt was a client of Lynne’s

Lynne Dewar has helped my clients get good loans in the past and continues to keep me informed on valuable home mortgage trends, tips, and techniques.  She works very hard to get home buyers the best loans to fit their individual circumstances.  Lynne seeks loan opportunities for home buyers and effectively matches client needs with efficient loan programs.  She is fully committed to helping buyers buy the homes of their dreams.  Lynne Dewar also demonstrates her professionalism almost weekly by providing the Northern Arizona real estate community with vital updates on mortgage lending via proactive e-mail contact.

Dusty Rhoton is a top appraiser in Northern Arizona and a licensed  real estate salesperson with United Country Northern Arizona Realty.  Dusty is a highly professional and exceedingly skilled property appraiser.  She is the only appraiser in Northern Arizona I would recommend fully without reservation as a result of the superior work she's done for me and my clients in the past.  As a salesperson at United Country Northern Arizona Realty, she offers property buyers and sellers unmatched marketing and real estate technology tools, superior understanding and expertise in the Northern Arizona real estate market, and transaction management skills.  She's one of the very best in the Northern Arizona real estate community.
